title: Asian adventure
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/India - Description and travel
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Jaipur (India) - Description and travel
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/China - Description and travel
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Taj Mahal (Agra, India)
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Asia - Description and travel
description: This visually stunning documentary captures the most forbidding and exotic of Asian locations in a series of fast moving adventures. Journey through China on a month-long bicycle tour through the southern Province of Guandong, witness dragon-boat racing and the magic of Chinese National Day celebrations. In India visit the magnificent waterways and colourful houseboats of Kashmir, tour the ancient fort city of Jhodpur and travel by camel across the Great Rajasthan Desert. Witness the magnificent spectacle of the city of Jaisalmer and embark on a fascinating bike ride from the famous pink city of Jaipur to Agra and it's breathtaking temple of love, the Taj Mahal.
